Read sequences were processed using the bcbio-nextgen pipeline (
https://github.com/bcbio/bcbio-nextgen ). In brief reads were aligned to the salmon genome (ICSASG_v2) using STAR [ 44]. The resulting .bam files were subsequently used to generate i) raw gene counts using featureCounts (v1.4.4) [ 45] using the NCBI Salmo salar Annotation Release 100 (available for download at https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genomes/all/annotation_releases/8030/100/). ii) exon counts using DEXSeq (dexseq_count.py) [ 46]. In addition reads were mapped directly to the transcriptome using Salmon (v0.10.2) [ 47]. Gene IDs from NCBI GeneBank database ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) were used to identify genes in this study.
